pages.text: The $(item)Caduceus$() is the $(l:bewitchment:creatures/baphomet)Baphomet$()'s tool of choice.$(br2)It has multiple-tool functionality comparable to $(item)Netherite$(). It can also be used to throw powerful fireballs.
The $(item)Caduceus$() can be repaired with $(item)Netherite Ingots$().
